t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Fresh Brand – Everything Pre-Sliced Bagels, 21 oz (6 ct)
s: I have tried Thomas, Daves Killer Bread, Whole Foods brand, some other random ones. And these are by far the best. But all of the other ones I was disappointed by and never bought again, so I don't want to oversell it. I will continue to buy these, the price is great and they are good enough for home use. They stay a bit chewy when toasted. ... For a packaged and delivered bagel, 'everything' has a great taste and is very fresh...

t: Amazon Fresh gets new private brand, expanded Prime savings | Grocery Dive
s: September 10, 2024 - This audio is auto-generated. Please let us know if you have feedback. Amazon announced Tuesday three updates to its Amazon Fresh brand, including the launch of Amazon Saver, a new value-focused private label line, and more discounts for Prime members shopping in-store and online.
